headline: Defense Stocks Can’t Escape the Trade War. Expect to Hear This Term.
summary: Defense stocks fall Monday as they face new supply chain challenges amid President Donald Trump’s trade war.

headline: Northrop's Arm Wins Contract to Support E-2C & D Hawkeye Jets
summary: NOC secures a $24.1 million modification contract to provide continued sustainment and technical support for the E-2C and E-2D aircraft as well as common and unique requirements.

raw.headline: Northrop's Arm Wins Contract to Support E-2C & D Hawkeye Jets
raw.summary: NOC secures a $24.1 million modification contract to provide continued sustainment and technical support for the E-2C and E-2D aircraft as well as common and unique requirements.

headline: RTX Wins $117M Contract to Support Standard Missile-6 Program
summary: RTX will provide funding for manufacturing, assembly, testing and delivery of SM-6 Tactical All-Up Rounds to support full-rate production requirements.
